resources.string: No direction found from this fragment
Your connection is lost. Please check your internet connection

The International Standard Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC4) is a global classification standard used to identify the economic activities of establishments. To determine the economic activity of an establishment in Nitaqat, select its corresponding ISIC4 code.
Compare with the expected Nitaqat if the number of employees changes

string.name: hyperLinkDesc
string.u: What is Nitaqat and how is it calculated?

resources.string: The entity’s Nitaqat corresponds to the Nationalization rate, which is based on economic activity.
The Nitaqat level and the Nationalization rate are calculated based on the number of Saudi and non-Saudi employees in the entity.
With the Nitaqat calculator, business owners can analyze their establishments\' current or future performance in the labor market.
The National ID/Iqama field must contain exactly 10 digits.
Check the calculator for Saudi labor market regulation program.
Validate certificates for your establishment, including the Nationalization Certificate.
View a list of occupations related to economic activities.
Calculate the total fee for work permits and determine the number of exempt workers.
